summer.title: Lemonade
summer.desc: Lemonade: sugar, water, lemon juice. Easy, right?

summer.title: Rooh Afza
summer.desc: Well, it is very popular summer cooling drink that every Indian has tried. If not then you must.

summer.title: Punjabi Style Boondi Kadhi
summer.desc: This is a yogurt based side dish made with curd and gram flour.

summer.title: Mango Custard
summer.desc: Custard is very refreshing and is packed with the goodness of milk which has calcium and protein. It is popular in any age group.

summer.title: VEGAN CAESAR SALAD
summer.desc: Vegan Caesar Salad features a homemade rich and creamy roasted garlic Caesar Dressing, fresh romaine, crispy chickpea croutons, almond parmesan, and avocado for the most amazing vegan salad!

summer.title: SIMPLE LEMON PASTA
summer.desc: Simple Lemon Pasta features tender pasta tossed with a buttery, garlic lemon sauce, red pepper flakes, and parsley for a delicious quick and easy vegan pasta dish!

summer.title: VEGAN QUESO
summer.desc: Vegan Queso is a quick and easy dip made with cashews, green chilies, nutritional yeast and warm spices for a deliciously thick, creamy condiment to pair with tortilla chips or veggie sticks!

rain.title: Veg Pakora/Snacks
rain.desc: Pakora are a delicious Indian crisp fried snack made with gram flour, spices & any main ingredient like onion, paneer or veggies.

rain.title: Samosa
rain.desc: Samosa is a deep fried pastry with a spiced filling usually made with potatoes, spices and herbs.

rain.title: Masala Chai(tea)
rain.desc: It is one of the favorite drinks among Indians especially during the monsoon and cold winters.

rain.title: Jalebi
rain.desc: This crispy and crunchy dessert is dipped in sugar syrup and is loaded with flavours.

rain.title: Roasted Chicken
rain.desc: Roast chicken is chicken prepared as food by roasting whether in a home kitchen, over a fire, or with a rotisserie (rotary spit).

rain.title: Vegetable Soup
rain.desc: A Vegetable Soup is so healthy and there are so many ways you can make them.

rain.title: Momos
rain.desc: Momos are a popular street food in northern parts of India. These are also known as Dim Sum and are basically dumplings made from flour with a savory stuffing.

rain.title: Aloo Tikki
rain.desc: In Hindi language, aloo are potatoes and tikki are patties. So these are potato patties made the Indian way â€“ spiced, herby and delicious.

rain.title: Papdi Chaat
rain.desc: Papdi chaat is a popular North Indian street food made with papdi (fried flour crispies), boiled chickpeas, potatoes, pakoris (fried black gram fritters) and curd.

rain.title: Paneer Tikka
rain.desc: Paneer Tikka is a popular and delicious tandoori snack where paneer (Indian cottage cheese cubes) are marinated in a spiced yogurt-based marinade, arranged on skewers and grilled in the oven.

winter.title: Bajra Roti
winter.desc: Bajra roti also known as bajra bhakri is a gluten-free flatbread made from millet flour or bajra flour. Low-Fat and Vegan.

winter.title: Sarson Ka Saag
winter.desc: One of the Indian recipe that is a labor of love, time and patience. Sarson is the hindi/Punjabi word for Mustard and Saag means Greens.

winter.title: Undhiyu
winter.desc: This is an easy and super delicious surti undhiyu that does not take much time.

winter.title: Kashmiri Dum Aloo
winter.desc: Dum Aloo is a delicious recipe of baby potatoes cooked in a gravy or sauce. This dish is made in various ways in Indian Cuisine.

winter.title: Rasam
winter.desc: This spiced, tangy, and sour rasam is sure to warm your palate and heal your cold if you have any.

winter.title: Instant Pot Pulao
winter.desc: This is a quick and one-pot method to make mix vegetable pulao in the instant pot.

winter.title: Baingan Bharta
winter.desc: This baingan bharta is a simple and easy to prepare recipe without the use of many spices.

winter.title: Vegetable Soup
winter.desc: A Vegetable Soup is so healthy and there are so many ways you can make them.

winter.title: Methi Malai Paneer
winter.desc: It is a creamy, mildly sweet gravy with hints of bitterness from fenugreek leaves.

winter.title: Chilli Paneer
winter.desc: Chilli Paneer is one of the popular recipe from the Indian Chinese cuisine. There are many ways of making it.
